ERROR.CRAPPY_BROWSER: Your browser does not support all the functionalities that Splinxs offers. Please use either Chrome, Firefox or Opera.
ERROR.CRAPPY_BROWSER_GUIDE: Your browser can't be used as a Splinxs guide. You must use either Chrome, Firefox or Opera.
ERROR.NO_MICROPHONE: You need a microphone in order to work as a Splinxs guide.

GENERAL.SURE_TO_LEAVE: Do you really want to leave this website?

G.MESSAGE_H5: Thank you for being a guide, once a tourist needs your help, you will be notified.
G.T_HELP_MESSAGE: A tourist needs you, do you want to help?

G_AREAS.ADD_DESCRIPTION: Click on the map to draw an area
G_AREAS.DESCRIPTION: Add circles to mark the region that you know well. Only tourists that are in these regions will contact you.  You can change the center and radius of existing circles or delete them.
G_AREAS.PAN_DESCRIPTION: Drag on the map to move around
G_AREAS.REMOVE_DESCRIPTION: Click on an area to delete it

G_LANGUAGES.LANGUAGES_INTRO: Please choose all your spooken languages
G_LANGUAGES.TITLE: Guide Languages

MENU.ABOUT_US_INTRODUCTION: We are both students at the Bern University of Applied Sciences in Biel
MENU.CONTACT_DESCRIPTION: For more information please send us an email

INDEX.AUDIO_DESCRIPTION: Realtime audio enables tourist and guide to talk together. The tourist can explain the situation to the guide which can help achieving the tourist’s goal.
INDEX.CHAT_DESCRIPTION: Realtime chat enables tourist and guide to share messages. In some situations text messages might be the fastest and most convenient way to communicate.
INDEX.DESCRIPTION_GUIDE: You know some places very well and want to help someone who is there? Sign up and start helping people right now.
INDEX.DESCRIPTION_TOURIST: You are somewhere unfamiliar and need help? Don't worry, a guide will help you. Thanks to camera, microphone, GPS and chat the guide will see what you see, speak with you and guide you to your destination.
INDEX.LOCATION_DESCRIPTION: Realtime location services enables the guide to know the tourist’s location. Both tourist and guide have the possibility to mark places on a map to highlight a location.
INDEX.VIDEO_DESCRIPTION: Realtime video enables the guide to see what the tourist sees. The tourist’s mobile device’s camera becomes the eyes of the guide. Now the guide can make sense of the tourist’s environment.

REGISTER.H3MESSAGE: You are an offical Splinxs guide!
REGISTER.SIGN_UP_MESSAGE: Sign up and become a Splinxs guide
REGISTER.THANKYOUMESSAGE: Now you can login and start helping tourists that need your help

T_LANGUAGES.LANGUAGES_INTRO: Select all your spoken languages and the relative skill

T_LOCATION.ADD_POS_MAN: you can add a position manually
T_LOCATION.CLICK_MAP: click on the map to add your current position
T_LOCATION.GUIDE_WILL_HELP: a guide that knows this region will help you
T_LOCATION.IMP_GET_GPS: Impossible to get the current location
T_LOCATION.PERMISSION_DENIED: permission denied, add your position by hand
